title: Best of Lucid Dreaming, Dream Yoga and Beyond(expanded)
description:
Best of Lucid Dreaming, Dream Yoga and Beyond(expanded)

Select files, containing almost 30 books and a lot more articles speaking about Dream Yoga and the art of Lucid Dreaming. 

Focusing more on techniques of dream yoga practices and not his metaphysical background, it goes from a tibetan(a lot more), kashmiri(trika) and hermetic-alchemical perspective on the subject. 

It contains ways(direct and indirect) to induce lucid dreaming and the manipulation of dream content at will and the pre-requisites for it as well.

Should be noted that:

I would recommend anybody to NOT do the kundalini/chakra process of those books aside from a real spiritual family/chain/iniciatic group or a qualified teacher/guru; 

However, since this -energy circulation, is a substantial component in mastering lucid dreaming- and what is associated with it, I included some books on pranayama and chikung, qiong and a like.(you will have very similar results and is not that dangerous).

Nevertheless, you can still have dreams lucidly in a quick manner, with concentration techniques and mindfulness techniques(with a equanimity awareness)- that is included, too. 

I used zip because is easier to compress then.
